items.sentence: Tom seems to be afraid of just about everything.
Tom seems to be angry, but not as angry as Mary.
Tom took off his coat and hung it in the closet.
Tom took pictures of all the animals at the zoo.
Tom tried to persuade Mary to come to his party.
Tom turned off his alarm and went back to sleep.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom had moved to Australia.
Tom certainly didn\'t expect anything like this.
Didn\'t you know Tom had a house on Park Street?
Didn\'t you know Tom had relatives in Australia?
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to be here today?
Didn\'t you know Tom was in Australia last year?
Don\'t you know Tom passed away three years ago?
Don\'t you think we should do something to help?
Unfortunately, this house has already been sold.
Whatever happens, I want you to know I love you.
Why aren\'t you wearing the bracelet I gave you?
Did you think that might be part of the problem?
Tom said he didn\'t think it was worth the risk.
Tom said he\'d let me know if anything happened.
Tom told Mary that he wanted to visit Australia.
Tom told Mary that she should go to the dentist.
Tom told everybody he wanted to become a barber.
Tom is sitting alone under that tree over there.
Tom said he thought that the room was too small.
Both Tom and Mary are award-winning journalists.
Tom doesn\'t like summer. He says it\'s too hot.
I didn\'t realize that Tom used to be a teacher.
Tom said he would buy something for Mary to eat.
Tom said it was too late to change his schedule.
Remember to walk the dog before going to school.
Tom moved out to Los Angeles to become an actor.
Tom never talked about what happened that night.
When did you decide not to allow Tom to do that?
When do you think Tom is going to want to leave?
When was the last time Tom played golf with you?
When was the last time that you talked with Tom?
Tom didn\'t remember where he\'d parked his car.
Perhaps you could learn a thing or two from Tom.
Please inform me of any change in his condition.
Tom was accused of falling asleep on guard duty.
Tom told Mary that he was going to go to Boston.
I\'m afraid that I dislocated my right shoulder.
I\'m at a loss what to buy Tom for his birthday.
Tom took his watch off and laid it on the table.
Tom tried to explain what was happening to Mary.
Tom usually feels sleepy in the early afternoon.
Too bad Tom wasn\'t there to show us what to do.
Mary didn\'t even read the message Tom sent her.
Mary doesn\'t let her sister borrow her clothes.
